data.name: Corpse disaster-survivors
data.detailed_description:
In another failed invasion plan you were caught in a storm
Cut off contact with friends who have worked together for many years
The city was thrown into a mess by the explosion of the laboratory and the spread of the virus
You are blocked by many virus-infected creatures and enemies
You don’t know that you are the one who planned this conspiracy
The current game is already a reset version
Because the game is a work driven out by the author in advance
I haven’t finished the optimization yet. If the configuration is not high, friends can wait
I will update the game content and optimize patches
I wish you all a happy play!
(The author is still learning the knowledge of ue4 to makegames. I hope to be considerate of some technically immature places)
枪械射击

怪物被攻击后收到的反应

枪械展示功能

刀和抓钩之间配合使用

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: 1.6GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
  • Additional Notes: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 32/64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c sound device
  • Additional Notes: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

data.legal_notice:
This game is only developed for a junior high school student
The material mostly comes from the ue4 mall. If there is any infringement, please contact the author.
Reselling and illegal advertising are prohibited without the author's explicit and permission, thank you for your cooperation
Reprinting of the game is prohibited without the author's consent
Resell this game
Thank you for your cooperation
Have fun
